channel.title: Bootcamps on Hello Friend NG
channel.description: Recent content in Bootcamps on Hello Friend NG

item.title: Exposing Coding Bootcamp From an Instructor
item.description: Are coding bootcamps a scam? Are they worth is in 2024? I have been a bootcamp instructor for a local coding bootcamp that runs through my local university since 2021. I’m currently teaching my 6th bootcamp cohort. First, let’s define which sub-topics Advertising Price Refunds Curriculum Staff Instructors TAs Tutors Graders Career Services Conclusion
